attributes.action: replace all public toilet taps with push buttons or motion sensored activation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
washing your hands in public toilets is a pointless exercise for the following reason.

1 - You turn on the tap with your dirty hands

2 - you clean your hands then, touch the tap to turn it off again, thus spreading germs on your hands

3 - you then have to open the door, with your germ ridden hands

Reducing contact with the tap reduces the spread of germs
